name: PENANG HERITAGE PRIVATE CYCLING TOUR
description: You will get close to know about Penang UNESCO Heritage by using bicycle and ride around the town. You will visit Penang Baba and Nyonya museum or Cheong Fatt Tze Museum (Blue Mansion) will full of historical and story at behind. Besides, using bicycle you will get more closer with our residents so called Penang Lang. You will able to visit all street art, steel-rod sculptures and do all the crazy pose for taking pictures as memory.
